title: Draught beer brand Oi to open own cafes now
description: Cipy said he has already invested Rs 15 crore in setting up the three breweries and sells over Rs 20,000 litres a month now, making Oi one of the largest in terms of volumes. He said he will invest more than Rs 2 crore to take the existing monthly capacity to over 50,000 litres shortly, as "we open more cafes".
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
